title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document comprehensive requirements for the LowLevelProgrammingTutor platform. Target audience includes professionals, students, and hobbyists. Cover essential low-level programming concepts such as assembly language, memory management, with potential inclusion of C or C++. Desired features encompass an interactive code editor, debugging tools, project templates, and learning objectives focus on understanding hardware, performance optimization, etc. Consider preferences for platform layout, design, and user experience. Also, consider potential collaboration and community-building aspects, including forums, chat rooms, and sharing of user-created projects. In the scope of this task, also define the project's milestones, timelines, and release plan. Finally, create a glossary of terms to assist users who are new to low-level programming.

title: Design System Architecture for LowLevelProgrammingTutor Platform
description: Design the overall system architecture for the LowLevelProgrammingTutor platform, including a detailed breakdown of frontend, backend, database components, APIs, necessary integrations or third-party services. This design should be scalable and flexible to accommodate future enhancements. Consider performance optimization strategies and security measures. Provide diagrams where appropriate to aid understanding.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the platform, including the learning modules, coding environments, and any additional features.

title: Implement Backend and Database
description: Develop the backend services and database for the platform, including user authentication, progress tracking, and any other necessary functionality.

title: Integrate Learning Content
description: Develop or integrate the learning content for low-level programming concepts, including assembly language and memory management.

title: Implement Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and implement a testing strategy for the platform, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deploy and Maintain Platform
description: Set up the infrastructure and deployment processes for the platform, including continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the platform adheres to best practices for security, including user authentication, data encryption, and protection against common vulnerabilities.
